mapper.select: /* AdmComCdMapper.selectComGrpCd */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM irsuser.GROUP_CD_BSC WHERE GROUP_CD = #{groupCd} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

/* AdmComCdMapper.selectComGrpCdDetail */ SELECT GROUP_CD /* 그룹코드 */ , GROUP_CD_NM /* 그룹코드명 */ , GROUP_CD_ENG_NM /* 그룹코드영문명 */ , GROUP_CD_EXPLN /* 그룹코드설명 */ , USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ FROM irsuser.GROUP_CD_BSC WHERE 1 = 1 WHERE GROUP_CD = #{groupCd}

/* AdmComCdMapper.selectCdRegYn */ SELECT CASE WHEN U.CD_REG_LMT_CNT = 0 THEN 'Y' WHEN U.CD_REG_LMT_CNT <= U.CNT THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM (SELECT G.GROUP_CD, G.CD_REG_LMT_CNT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM irsuser.CD_DTL C INNER JOIN irsuser.GROUP_CD_BSC G ON G.GROUP_CD = C.GROUP_CD AND G.GROUP_CD = #{groupCd} WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND G.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY G.GROUP_CD, G.CD_REG_LMT_CNT ) U

/* AdmComCdMapper.selectComCdDetail */ SELECT G.GROUP_CD , C.CD , C.CD_NM , C.CD_ENG_NM , C.CD_EXPLN , C.SORT_SNO , C.USE_YN FROM irsuser.CD_DTL C INNER JOIN irsuser.GROUP_CD_BSC G ON G.GROUP_CD = C.GROUP_CD AND G.GROUP_CD = #{groupCd} WHERE 1 = 1 AND CD = #{cd} AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND G.DEL_YN = 'N'
